amendment.description: To substitute a requirement for an annual report on competitive sourcing activities on lists required under the Federal Activities Inventory Reform Act of 1998 that are performed for executive agencies by Federal Government sources, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1923 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 1. Record Vote Number: 407.

action.text: Amendment SA 1923 proposed by Senator Thomas. (consideration: CR S13101-13105; text: CR S13101) To substitute a requirement for an annual report on competitive sourcing activities on lists required under the Federal Activities Inventory Reform Act of 1998 that are performed for executive agencies by Federal Government sources, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1923 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 1. Record Vote Number: 407.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1923 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 1. Record Vote Number: 407.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1923 proposed by Senator Thomas.
